Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
Swoop down for a melee attack, entering [abilityblue]Defense Mode[/abilityblue] afterwards.
This unit unleashes a mighty roar in a {MightyCone} hex cone-shaped area of effect.
Alter DNA structure of target Biological or Cyborg unit to heal wounds. Restores {healAmount}[hp/] and removes all non-Psionic status effects.

Attempt to [abilityred]Mind Control[/abilityred] a non-Mindless or non-Mechanical unit with {PacifyChance}[strengthBio/] strength chance.[br/]The effect last until the end of combat or until this unit is killed.

Reveal detailed information about the weaknesses of the target unit. All units of this type become [abilityred]Scanned[/abilityred] until the end of combat, giving them -{ScanResistance} resistance to all damage types.
Sprout thick roots bristling with thorns that deal damage to units hit.
Reveal weaknesses, reducing all resistances by {ScanResistanceAmount}.

Alter weather by manipulating clouds. Removes all Thermal, Biological and Kinetic hazard markers from the map. All Flying units are inflicted with [abilityred]Turbulence[/abilityred], reducing their accuracy by {TurbulenceAccuracy}% as well as reducing their movement speed for {TurbulenceDuration}[turn/].[br/] Cloudships units are not affected.

Deploy a special aerosol mist, healing Biological and Cyborg units in the initial spread for {SoothInitialHeal}. The aerosol then remains for {MistDuration}, making targets in the mist {MistEvadeBonus} harder to hit and healing them for {MistHeal}.
Deploy a condensed, electrically-charged cloud that clings to the ground for {cloudDuration}[turn/].
This unit plants itself in the ground for {SpawnForestDuration}, after which it terraforms the sector into a Forest Sector.[br/]Doesn't work on Mountain sectors.
Terraforming the sector into a forest. Process will complete in [INT_duration].
This unit can terraform sectors into Forest.
Target dead Plant or Animal unit is returned to life with full [hp/] and under the player’s control. Does not affect other Arborian Queens.
A powerful quake erupts in a {RootQuakeArea} hex-wide area, destroying obstacles and Entangling units.

Create a {HyperPollinationArea} hex area of effect centered on the unit. All friendly Biological and Cyborg units are healed for {HyperPollinationHP} and gain [abilityblue]Hyper Focused[/abilityblue] for {HyperPollinationTime}. [abilityblue]Hyper Focused[/abilityblue] grants {HyperFocusedMorale} morale and {HyperFocusedAccuracy} accuracy.
Control a creature's instinctual reactions. The unit gains {Morale}[happiness/] and {PsionicResistance}[defensePsyche/] resistance.
This unit gains [abilityblue]Detection[/abilityblue], can no longer be flanked, gains {SensorRange} Sensor Range and is {EvasionBonus} harder to hit.
By grounding itself, this unit gains [abilityBlue]Stagger Resistance[/abilityBlue] and +{ArcResistance}[defenseWave/] resistance.

This unit gains the [abilityblue]Plant Roots (Improved)[/abilityblue] defense mode, healing it for {PlantRootHeal}[hp/] and granting {ArmorAmount}[armor/].[br/]If the unit has an [abilityred]Entangle[/abilityred] ability, it now also deals {EntangleDamage} damage each turn to Entangled enemies.

This unit gains [abilityblue]Regeneration[/abilityblue], healing it for {Healing%}% of its maximum [hp/] each turn in combat and restoring all of its [hp/] at the start of its owner's turn on the strategic map.[br/]The unit also gains {BiochemicalResistance}[DefenseBio/] resistance.
Forge a powerful mental link between rider and mount. The unit gains {Damage}% critical hit damage, {Morale}[happiness/] and becomes {HarderToHit}% harder to hit.
This pylon pulses with a wildlife control signal. Each turn, a random Amazon wildlife unit will spawn next to the pylon. This pylon remains active for {duration}[turn/].
This pylon channels a healing field. At the start of each turn, friendly Biological and Cyborg units within {range} hexes of the pylon heal for {Heal}[hp/].
This pylon channels an enhancement field. Adjacent friendly Biological units within {range} hex of the pylon deal {damage}% more damage.

Target a Biological, Mineral or Cyborg unit to apply [abilityred]Sleep[/abilityred] with {SleepChance}[StrengthBio/] strength chance for {duration}[turn/]. If resisted, apply [abilityred]Slow[/abilityred] instead.
This unit is asleep and cannot move or act. The Sleep effect is canceled if the unit takes any direct damage.
Direct Damage in this sense means damage from gunfire or other attacks, as opposed to Indirect Damage which is caused by being poisoned, or being on fire
Fire an arrow that flashes a {hexrad} hex radius area on impact.
This unit benefits from a shield manupulation, granting them {ManipulateShield}.
The device on top of the Hydromancer creates a whirlpool for {WhirlpoolDuration} and attempts to disable and immobilize those hit.
The Aquatica's Octowhale sings a song that prompts other sealife to assist with this combat.
Target unit gains a shield dome for {ManipulateShieldDuration}, granting it and any friendly adjacent units +{ManipulateShield} for the duration.
This unit benefits from a shield dome manipulation, granting them and adjacent friendly units {ManipulateShield}.
This unit benefits from being adjacent to a shield dome, granting them {ManipulateShield}.
{EntangledChance}[strengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Crushing Entanglement[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal non-Flying units for {durationEntangled}[turn/]
This unit cannot move, but can still perform actions. It also takes {EntangledDamage} damage per [turn/]

The unit's attacks have {EntangledChance}[strengthPhysical/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Crushing Entanglement[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal non-Flying units for {durationEntangled}[turn/]. The unit also gains the [abilityblue]Plant Roots (Improved)[/abilityblue] defense mode.
A powerful melee attack that strikes all targets in front of the unit and can [abilityred]Knock Back[/abilityred] Light units.
